verbose_text: Notably, several high throughput phosphoproteomic studies detected phosphorylated residues (XREF_SUPPLEMENTARY) within the iRhom2 cytoplasmic tail, triggered in response to LPS and to G protein coupled receptor agonists known to stimulate TACE activity.
evidence: phosphorylated residues ( XREF_SUPPLEMENTARY ) within the iRhom2 cytoplasmic tail, triggered in response to LPS and to G protein
